section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.intro: Welcome to Real Estate Referrer ("Platform", "we", "us", or "our"). These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our referral program platform for real estate transactions in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.
section1.agreement: By creating an account or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use our Platform.

referrer.definition: An individual who registers on the Platform to refer potential clients (leads) to the real estate agent.

lead.definition: A potential client referred by a Referrer who is interested in buying, selling, renting, or leasing real estate in Dubai.

qualified_lead.definition: A lead with genuine interest, defined budget, complete contact information, and active timeline (0-6 months).

agent.definition: The licensed real estate professional operating under Solo Gate Real Estate (Alliance by EMAAR).

commission.definition: The payment due to the Referrer upon successful completion of a real estate transaction.

transaction.definition: A completed sale or rental agreement facilitated through a referred lead.

eligibility.title: 3.1 Eligibility Requirements
eligibility.intro: To become a Referrer, you must:
items: Be at least 18 years of age
Provide accurate and complete registration information
Have a valid phone number for SMS verification
Sign the Business Introducer Agreement (electronically or physically)
Not hold a real estate license in the UAE (unless disclosed)

security.title: 3.2 Account Security
security.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account.

sms.title: 3.3 SMS Verification
sms.text: We use SMS verification (2FA) to secure your account. Standard messaging rates may apply. By registering, you consent to receive SMS messages for verification purposes.

rate.title: 4.1 Commission Rate
rate.text2: of the agent's commission on each completed transaction. The rate varies by lead type: 25% for Buyers, 20% for others (Sellers, Landlords, Tenants).

payment.title: 4.2 Payment Terms
payment.text: Commission is paid within 45-60 days following the signing of the sales contract (Title Deed) or within 14 days following the signing of the rental contract (Tenancy Contract) and receipt of funds by the agent.

method.title: 4.3 Payment Method
method.text: Commissions are paid by bank transfer to the account provided by the referrer during registration.

nonPayment.title: 4.4 Cases of Non-Payment
nonPayment.intro: No commission will be due in the following cases:
items: The lead provided was already known to the agent before your referral
The client cancels the transaction or does not follow through
The information provided was false or incomplete
The client did not give consent to be contacted

requirements.title: 5.1 Lead Requirements
items: Client's full name
Valid email address
Valid phone number
Type of lead (Buyer, Seller, Landlord, or Tenant)
Approximate budget
Client's explicit consent to be contacted

consent.title: 5.2 Client Consent (MANDATORY)
consent.text: You must obtain the client's explicit consent before submitting their information. By submitting a lead, you confirm that:
items: The client knows they will be contacted by a real estate agent
The client has agreed to share their contact information
You have not misrepresented the purpose of collecting their information
consent.warning: Submitting leads without proper consent is a violation of these Terms and GDPR regulations, and may result in immediate account termination.

protection.title: 5.3 Lead Protection
items: Leads are timestamped and attributed to the first Referrer who submits them
Duplicate leads are automatically rejected
Lead ownership is valid for 12 months from submission date
You can track your lead status in real-time through your dashboard

prohibited.title: 5.4 Prohibited Practices
items: Submitting fake or fabricated leads
Submitting leads without the client's consent
Direct solicitation or cold calling on behalf of the agent
Misrepresenting yourself as a licensed real estate agent
Submitting your own contact information as a lead
Any activity that violates RERA regulations

section6.title: 6. Referrer Obligations
section6.intro: As a Referrer, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate information about yourself and your leads
Obtain proper consent from clients before submission
Not engage in any illegal or unethical marketing practices
Respect the confidentiality of client information
Not negotiate directly with clients on real estate matters
Comply with all applicable UAE laws and RERA regulations
Maintain the signed Business Introducer Agreement

section7.title: 7. Agent Obligations
items: Follow up on all qualified leads within 48 hours
Provide transparent status updates through the Platform
Pay commissions within the agreed timeframe
Treat all referred clients professionally
Not circumvent the Referrer's commission rights
Maintain all required RERA licenses and permits

section8.title: 8. Intellectual Property
section8.intro: The Platform, including its design, features, and content, is owned by us and protected by intellectual property laws. You may not:
items: Copy, modify, or distribute any part of the Platform
Use our branding without written permission
Reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code
Use the Platform for any purpose other than its intended use

section9.title: 9. Privacy & Data Protection
section9.intro: Your use of the Platform is also governed by our
items: We collect and process personal data in accordance with GDPR
Client data is used solely for real estate transactions
We do not sell personal data to third parties
You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data
Data is stored securely with encryption

byReferrer.title: 10.1 Termination by Referrer
byReferrer.text: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us. Pending commissions for completed transactions will still be paid.

byUs.title: 10.2 Termination by Us
byUs.intro: We may suspend or terminate your account if you:
items: Violate these Terms
Submit fraudulent leads
Engage in prohibited practices
Fail to maintain the Business Introducer Agreement

effect.title: 10.3 Effect of Termination
items: Your access to the Platform will be revoked
Pending qualified leads may still earn commission if converted within 90 days
Unpaid commissions over 500 AED will be paid within 30 days

section11.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
section11.intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
items: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
Our total liability is limited to the commissions earned in the past 12 months
We do not guarantee any specific income or number of conversions
We are not responsible for client behavior or transaction outcomes

section12.title: 12. RERA Compliance
section12.intro: This Platform operates in compliance with the Real Estate Regulatory Agency (RERA) of Dubai. Important notes:
items: Referrers act as business introducers, not licensed real estate agents
All real estate activities are conducted by licensed professionals
The Agent maintains all required RERA permits and licenses
Referrers must not engage in activities requiring a real estate license

informal.title: 13.1 Informal Resolution
informal.text: We encourage you to contact us first to resolve any disputes amicably.

law.title: 13.2 Governing Law
law.text: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates, specifically the Emirate of Dubai.

jurisdiction.title: 13.3 Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.text: Any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Dubai, UAE.

section14.title: 14. Changes to Terms
section14.intro: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via:
items: Email notification
Platform notification
Updated "Last modified" date
section14.continued: Continued use of the Platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
